coreAttributes.name: Gun Drone
coreAttributes.description: Oh, so you thought it was just a floating disk? WRONG! This gun drone is powered by your own arcane aura and will fight on your behalf. Obviously, this is in the wrong game. But we're not sorry..
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: fire at [npc2.name] with the gun drone.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] motion for the drone to follow, It [npc.verb(position)] itself by [npc.her] shoulder, awaiting it's next command.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] command [npc.her] drone to stop following and enter power save mode, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.namePos] drone [npc.verb(line)] up [npc2.name] in [npc.namePos] sights and [npc.verb(fires)]. A spray of ethereal rounds strikes [npc2.name], causing [npc2.her] to lose energy.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.namePos]] drone [npc.verb(line)] up [npc2.name] in [npc.namePos] sights and [npc.verb(pull)]. The spray of shots goes wide! hitting the ground uselessly.
